attributes.action: Reopen Night Fishing Now as it is a single person sport
attributes.additional_details:
It is detrimental to mental health, it is a single person sport.
If you have a local fishery you should be able to night fish the fresh air and tranquility of the surroundings is good for the mind.
All pegs are separate so perfect for social distancing rules.
attributes.background: I want you to reopen fisheries for night fishing.

rejection.details: Petitioners need to include both a first name or a surname before we can consider a petition for publication.
